Hi there! Sorry I didn't post recently, but it's been one hell of a 
week. I'm already overwhelmed by homeworks! I'm also afraid things 
won't get better till the start of November. This means that I'll try 
posting as often as I can, but that these post will be few and not as 
often as I would like. To make things a little better, I'll lend my 
chars to those who would like them. 

Tyrael, though, goes to Airly if she wants it. If not, then Robo gets 
him. And if Robo can't, well, just make a contest! =P

I'd like Azure to go to Jeff.

As for Yggdrasil, Dreadplague, Clawstorm and Blackfang, share them 
among yourselves or tell me if you won't use them.

Thanks!

Nic
